::Torca got to the stasis pod::
Torca: Okay, press a button here, one there...
Computer: Replication beginning
::The pod passes over a big dogfox.  the robot emerges::
Sideswipe: Sideswipe, Maximize!
Torca: THE Sideswipe?
Sideswipe: Yes.

::Meanwhile, Bluestreak and Ratchet were in the ark, searching for the rogues 
that Ram Horn spoke of::
Ratchet: Hey theres someone!
::he points at Wraith::
Bluestreak: who are you, speak up now.
